All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Aggressive  
    Basher
    This class represents a ship that deliberately tries to collide with other ships.
    Drunkard
    This class represents a Drunkard spaceship, which behaves in random manner, it teleports randomly, moves randomly, actives its shield when feeling of death danger (life is less than 11 points), and always trying to shoot everything in front of him.
    Human
    This class represents the human controlled spaceship.
    Runner
    This class represents a ship that tries to avoid all other ships.
    SpaceShip
    The API spaceships need to implement for the SpaceWars game.
    SpaceShipFactory
    This class creates all the spaceship objects according to the command line arguments.
    SpaceShipFactoryTest  
    SpaceWars
    This class acts as the driver for the Space Wars game.
    Special
    This class represents a Special spaceship, which behaves like a Guardian Angel for the Human ship, attacks other ships that tries to harm it (i.e Aggressive and Basher), and that Drunkard one who endangers all of the ships, by riding drunk.
